thread.section_title: St Paul's Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely ambience, great stay
thread.title_full: Lovely ambience, great stay - Review of St Paul's Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: louise K
title: Lovely ambience, great stay
text:
The hotel has a lovely feel to it, very nice style and you can tell it's a quality establishment as soon as you arrive.
My room was up in the eaves, with a corner bed which was very comfy.
Continental breakfast was included, and it was delicious - smoked salmon, freshly baked croissants, and lovely fresh fruit.
A short stroll from Hammersmith station, I would definitely stay again.
